title: School ban in the United States The flag T-shirt on Cinco de Mayo
subtitle: :: Rumours: A federal court upheld a ruling that school staff acted correctly when they asked students to remove clothes containing U.S. flag designs in Cinco de Mayo.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A federal court upheld a ruling that school staff acted correctly in requiring students to remove clothes containing United States flag designs in Cinco de Mayo.
